certifications.name: Certified Network Associate
certifications.details: Entry-level certification from Cisco Systems that validates foundational skills in networking technologies, essential for roles like network administrator or engineer. It covers broad topics including network fundamentals, IP connectivity, security basics, and automation.

certifications.name: DurianPy
certifications.details: Member of DurianPy (Python community). Participated in community discussions, shared resources, and collaborated on learning and small projects.

certifications.name: UI/UX Competition
certifications.details: Participated in a UI/UX design competition featuring a Minecraft-inspired theme. Worked on concept, layout, and presentation of the interface while balancing usability and aesthetics under time constraints.

certifications.name: Capture the Flag
certifications.details: Participated in a Capture the Flag (CTF) event focused on practical security problem-solving (web, crypto, reversing, and basic forensics). Collaborated and learned common attack/defense patterns and tooling.

certifications.name: NASA Space Apps 2025
certifications.details: Supported event operations and technical coordination for teams (orbitals/technical track). Assisted with participant guidance, logistics, and technical help to keep the event running smoothly.
